dublin_core.dcvalue: Recent studies in Bioengineering show a great interest in telemedicine projects it is motivated mainly for the fast communication technologies reached during the last decade Since then many telemedicine projects in different areas have been pursued among them the electrocardiographic monitoring as well as methodological reports for the evaluation of these projects In this work a methodology to evaluate an electrocardiographic telemonitoring system is presented A procedure to verify the operation of Data Acquisition Module DAM of an electrocardiographic telemonitoring system is given taking as reference defined standards and procedures for the measurement of the Quality of Service QoS parameters required by the system in a Local Area Network LAN Finally a graphical model and protocols of evaluation are proposed
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:19:15Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2007-11-16
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Design of a methodology for assessing an electrocardiographic telemonitoring system.
